name.full: Aisaac - AI Agent with File Upload Support

description.short: AI Agent with ephemeral file upload support
description.full: Aisaac is an intelligent AI agent that can process PDF, DOCX, TXT, and EML files ephemerally. Files are processed in memory and immediately discarded, with only the extracted text content preserved in conversation context for analysis and reference.
